page.title: 13A FAMOUS CUSTOM IN ALVA
page.content: The highlight of the Alva Games is the {Hill Race.}Competitors run across the park,over the road,up a steep gully, across the golf course then up Wee Torry (which is 413m vertical) round the flag marker then back down the hill again. It takes about 12 mins to go up and about 3 mins to come back down and it is the most energy-sapping of all the {events.}The Junior Hill Race takes about 8 mins and is only half way up Torry,and there is also a veteran's race. At the end of the day celebrations take place in the Johnstone Arms and the No.5 Inn. It is a great occasion and great{entertainment.
